Test Description: Verify that PB1 causes a pause
Verify pressing the left arrow key causes the snake to turn left
Verify pressing the right arrow key causes the snake to turn left
Verify pressing the up arrow key causes the snake to turn upwards
Verify pressing the down arrow key causes the snake to turn downwards
Verify that the game ends when the snakes collides with itself
Verify that the LCD display updates correctly when the snake eats food
Verify that the brightness of the display follows the readings taken by the luminence sensor(shown on the LCD display)
Verify that the length of the snake and the score increases by 1 when it eats food
